section.para: Zend_Validate_Hex allows you to validate if a given value contains only hexadecimal characters. These are all characters from 0 to 9 and A to F case insensitive. There is no length limitation for the input you want to validate.

note.para: All other characters will return false, including whitespace and decimal point. Also unicode zeros and numbers from other scripts than latin will not be treaten as valid.

section.para: There are no additional options for Zend_Validate_Hex:
